ABOUT.MONGODB_DESC: Cloud NoSQL document database with authentication
ABOUT.DISCUSSION_DESC: Real-time discussion via WebSocket (STOMP/SockJS) with backend persistence (Spring Boot).
ABOUT.EXCEPTION_REPORT_DESC: Send a report of all tracked user connections and exceptions with IP addresses from the last 7 days
ABOUT.REPORT_ACTIONS_SUBTITLE: Send by email, view or refresh the report in a single click.
ABOUT.STREAMING_ARCHITECTURE_DESC: Hybrid streaming system with client-side caching
ABOUT.STREAMING_OVERVIEW: The system uses a hybrid approach: backend streams ALL events once via Server-Sent Events (SSE), frontend caches ALL events in memory, and displays only 8 at a time with client-side pagination.
ABOUT.STREAMING_BACKEND_DESC: Backend streams all matching events from MongoDB 8.2 via SSE, one by one, in real-time.
ABOUT.STREAMING_FRONTEND_DESC: Frontend caches all events in memory. Scrolling uses cached data - NO backend calls.
ABOUT.STREAMING_BENEFITS_DESC: Fast scrolling with no network latency, instant display of next 8 events, offline-ready, instant search/filter on cached data.
ABOUT.STREAMING_APPROACH_DESC: Stream once, cache all, client-side pagination

SAVE_CACHE.TITLE: Data Maintenance
SAVE_CACHE.DESC: Executes maintenance tasks: saves compressed image cache and cleans up old Govee records (IoT thermometers). Govee records older than the configured retention period will be deleted.
SAVE_CACHE.NOT_AUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to execute maintenance tasks
